question: Which of the following is not a correct match of India's R&D facilities with their locations?
option2: High Energy Materials Research Laboratory (HEMRL) - Chennai
option4: All of the above are correct
answer: High Energy Materials Research Laboratory (HEMRL) - Chennai
explanation: The Armament Research & Development Establishment (ARDE) Pune in association with High Energy Materials Research Laboratory (HEMRL) Pune, and Instruments Research & Development Establishment (IRDE) Dehradun have developed the Laser Guided Anti Tank Guided Missile (ATGM) which was tested successfully by defeating a target located at 3 km on 22 September, 2020.
